Posts.Content: I don't know what I would do about the 4 or 6 treatments of chemo.  Luckily, I was never faced with that decision.  Did he have any stats as to how 6 would help you over 4?  Maybe 4 treatments would be enough. Can you talk to anyone else as to how many they had?  I wish you luck with chemo, no matter how many you have. As far as your ps's comment, strange. Good luck!
